Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 to me, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its worth to you is also $8,000, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. Don't miss out on this chance to acquire something truly remarkable. Let's discuss further if this offer suits your budget and preferences. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
